text: Sidroe-droe nabi hana bak gopnyan Ureueng tawanan nyang ka geukeubah â€˜Oh geupeutalo musoh lam bumoe Baro watee nyoe tawanan nyang sah Napsu gata dum areuta donya Di Tuhan teuma ka lheuh Neukeubah Tuhan meunapsu pahla akhirat Keu gata meuhat nyang got that leupah Teuma cit Tuhan Maha Perkasa Ngon bijaksana areh that leupah
